meter_reading.notes: The odometer wheels clearly show 02271.8, which is 2271.8 m³. The red needle on the small circular dial is positioned past the 0.03 mark but has not reached the halfway point towards 0.04. Therefore, it is read as 0.03 m³. The estimated needle angle of 115 degrees reflects its position between 0.03 (108 degrees) and 0.04 (144 degrees), closer to 0.03.
